message.content:
cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.SI

The paper deals with the problem of recognizing multi-talker mixed speech, which is a subfield of speech recognition. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.SD (Sound). The paper also proposes a deep learning-based approach to address the problem, which falls under the subfield of machine learning and specifically deep learning. This makes cs.CL (Computation and Language) another likely category. Additionally, the paper introduces a new training strategy that solves the label permutation problem, which is a subfield of optimization and could fall under cs.LG (Learning) or cs.SI (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed approach on an artificially mixed dataset, which could also fall under cs.SI.
